Polar bear projection model

*Life cycle model*
$n(t+1) = A_t*n(t)$

```{r}
# Survival of each stage
sigma_1to3 <- 0.916
sigma_4_6 <- 0.947
sigma_5 <- 0.950
sigma_7to9 <- 0.870
sigma_10 <- 0.933
sigma_litter <- 0.496

# Probability of breeding for females
beta_4 <- 0.437
beta_5 <- 0.104

# Population Matrix
A <- matrix(data=c(0.02115, 0.074, 0.0846,
                   0.563,   0,     0, 
                   0,       0.563, 0.563),
            nrow=3, ncol=3, byrow=TRUE)

```
